QueryDefination.QueryString: select top 100 M.ActionId, M.ExternalAction, M.SourceEndPointId, M.DestinationEndPointId, M.MessageId , dateAdd(hh, 8, M.CreatedDatetime) CreatedDatetime, D.[Version], D.DocumentXml from AifMessageLog M inner join AifDocumentLog D on M.DataAreaId = D.DataAreaId and M.MessageId = D.MessageId where M.DataAreaId = 'las' and M.ActionId = 'SalesSalesOrderService.create' and M.SourceEndPointId = 'Lacoste_BTS' and M.DestinationEndPointId = 'Lacoste' and D.[Version] = @DocVersion -- {DocVersion} and M.CreatedDatetime <= dateAdd(hh, -8, @CreatedDT_UB) -- {CreatedDT_UB} and M.CreatedDatetime >= dateAdd(hh, -8, @CreatedDT_LB) -- {CreatedDT_LB} order by M.CreatedDatetime desc, D.[Version]
